Comforable rooms with independent restrooms and heat water.

Variety of meat dishes for every taste, homemade food, à la carte dishes, rustic atmosphere and friendly attention
You can ride the that river follows a meandering path crossing the wide and green valley of Penderisco.
Urrao has a huge amount of places where you can practice tourism of adventure. There are plenty of nature where you can test your limits and skills
It is one of the highest mountains of the Western Cordillera of Antioquia. It is known as Paramo of Frontino as well and it has an exhuberante nature and variety of species
Concerning the flora the Paramo of Frontino has more than 2405 registered species of plants. Some of the most beautiful are the orchids and frailejons
These plants live at high altitude in the Páramo ecosystems and grow slowly during the year
This kind of bear is the only one that lives in the South American mountains
The "queso dulce" is the most typical product of Urrao. This delicious product is prepared with milk and sugar.
Urrao is a town located in the western region of Antioquia-Colombia. It has a population of approximately 42000 inhabitants and an extension of 2.556 km²
Variety of meat dishes for every taste, homemade food, à la carte dishes, rustic atmosphere and friendly attention
How people from Urrao are called?
People from Urrao are called Urraeños and they are recognized for being gentle, hard-working and happy
The Central Park of Urrao is one of the most beautiful of Antioquia. It is known because it was built in honor of Cacique Tone one of the main icons of this town
With more than 100 years since it was built, the Fonda San Jose has been visited for many people that want to know a piece of history about Urrao and its culture.
This is one of the newest bars in Urrao. It has a big parking lot and a place for horses. Beautiful rustic decoration
It is a bar located near the central park of Urrao. It has a place for horses and its decoration is representative of the culture of Antioquia
